sentences.sContent: And, this Valentines Day, pamper yourself.
sentences.sCn: 最后，这个情人节，纵容一下自己。

sentences.sContent: o I can choose to pamper myself while I am in this unhappy place.
sentences.sContent_eng: o I can choose to pamper myself while I am in this unhappy place.
sentences.sCn: 当我不幸福时，我可以选择纵容一下自己。

synos.tran: 纵容；使…过量；给…吃得过多
